section.section: The Baltimore County Board of License Commissioners may issue a WS (wine sampling) permit to bona fide nonprofit organizations.

The WS permit authorizes the consumption of wine for tasting or sampling purposes:
On Class B licensed premises with the consent of the licensee; or
On premises without a permanent alcoholic beverages license.
The permit holder may not serve more than 2 ounces from each brand to any 1 person.

The bona fide nonprofit organization:
Shall apply for a WS permit at least 15 days prior to the day of issuance; and
May not be issued more than 12 WS permits in any given license year.
The permit fee is $30 per day.
The WS permit holder is authorized to bring wine onto Class B licensed premises for sampling or tasting purposes only.

text.section: The provisions of this section are not restricted by the provisions in subsection (b) of § 12-107 of this article.
